title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, November 22, 1863
summary: Hotchkiss relates news from camp, concerning officers, preaching, and camp life. He comments on family news, and on various other topics.
keywords: Women, Family, Death/Casualties, National Government, Military Authority, Camp Life, Church/Religious Activity, Prisons/Prisoners, Arts/Leisure, Home Front, American Civil War
